alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:13AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 545 AM CDT/445 AM MDT/... At 513 AM CDT/413 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Cody, or 34 miles west of Valentine, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cody, Nenzel, Merritt Reservoir, Schoolhouse Lake, Steer Creek Campground and Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 157 and 173. Highway 97 between mile markers 109 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
